title: Lawless Justice
description: Cass has left an abusive relationship. Vowing no one will hurt her again, she returns to her home town, Northampton, in the hope of mending the relationship with her family, but she soon gets drawn into deadly situation. Cass has to decide quickly, does she remain invisible or is it time to stand out?Enter the Kittnz.Six sexy but tough women that serve the public by dealing out justice the Kittnz way... for a price.Dangerous women you would love to hate.
author: Karina Kantas
